channel.title: seanreiser tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from seanreiser.

item.description: @rachelclarke It's funny, I was just posting how I wasn't effected https://t.co/MS0jEZ01ld. As an American I have a different relationship with the Royal Family (they're more like celebrities than a monarchs)
item.source:markdown: @rachelclarke It's funny, I was just posting how I wasn't effected https://t.co/MS0jEZ01ld. As an American I have a different relationship with the Royal Family (they're more like celebrities than a monarchs)

item.description: I hope this doesn't piss anyone off. I don't have the emotional bandwidth to be deeply affected by the passing of the Queen. I mean I feel bad for her family but I'm not sad, my first thought was... - https://t.co/MS0jEZ01ld via @seanreiser
item.source:markdown: I hope this doesn't piss anyone off. I don't have the emotional bandwidth to be deeply affected by the passing of the Queen. I mean I feel bad for her family but I'm not sad, my first thought was... - https://t.co/MS0jEZ01ld via @seanreiser

item.description: @GreatBrianLast @TheJimCornette Hey Brian, I just finished a #podcasting2.0 project for a client, and it occurs to me that the chapter cover art would be a great use for Travis’ artwork. (There are some other interesting features as well)
item.source:markdown: @GreatBrianLast @TheJimCornette Hey Brian, I just finished a #podcasting2.0 project for a client, and it occurs to me that the chapter cover art would be a great use for Travis’ artwork. (There are some other interesting features as well)

item.description: @recruiterchad You forgot a deep understanding of rocket engineering, expertise in nuclear power plants and hacking the human genome and fluency in Klingon. H1B only.
item.source:markdown: @recruiterchad You forgot a deep understanding of rocket engineering, expertise in nuclear power plants and hacking the human genome and fluency in Klingon. H1B only.

item.description: @fontawesome Please keep them separate. O I don't know when but I suspect someday I'll need to iconify the difference between iPhone regular and Pro
item.source:markdown: @fontawesome Please keep them separate. O I don't know when but I suspect someday I'll need to iconify the difference between iPhone regular and Pro

item.description: @davewiner I'm about a mile from Utopia Bagels and have a vacuum sealer. I wonder if bagels would survive being sealed and overnighted. I'd be happy to help you get your fix every now and then.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner I'm about a mile from Utopia Bagels and have a vacuum sealer. I wonder if bagels would survive being sealed and overnighted. I'd be happy to help you get your fix every now and then.
